Text: Hey EinDeutschMan, I love your Rosetta Stone torrents a lot, and they've been really helpful.  I was wondering if you had a preinstalled one for Vietnamese?  If you did, that'd be great.  Thanks!

@gkha,

Sorry, I don't, but I'll look for it.

Please let me know if the speech section doesn't work correctly, 
apparently when I created some of the previous torrents, the speech files were omitted.

I've used your Mandarin one, and I believe I'm using your Latin American Spanish one as well, and I have no trouble using the speech, if you mean the ability to speak into the mic and lesson.  

Thanks so much!  I'll keep a look on for your torrents and if you do manage to upload it, many thanks ahead of time!

thanks again so much. I have korean and english installed and they both work, even if i can't figure out how to use them! hahahaha...

any chance you have Thai hanging around?
Is this American or British English? Thanks for all of you hard work!!

YodaBoy44,
This version is American, but I also have British
British English would be great. I already have levels 1,2,3 but can't get levels 4 and 5. Can you upload them pls? Thx a lot

@xpert10,
Sorry, I don't have levels 4 or 5 either.
thank you very much, it works perfectly
I took off the torrent, but can not open any level, did I need a program that opens the file RSI?
Thanks a lot, will try it!!
am downloading at the moment. Thanks so much! You are one of the reasons why internet piracy is so good, and exhilirating! :D

Sorry, I meant the American one. Could you please upload an American one with speech? Thanks!
